title: My league client is really slow! Help!
body: Every time I try to open up league, I have to click it, so that the league logo shows up, but the league client doesn’t, about 5-10 times until the client will finally open, and when I log in, after putting in my details, it will take 2 minutes to sign in ( it normally takes 10 seconds.) then when I finally get logged on in the clients, the overview doesn’t show up, you can’t click the play button ( its grey). My loot Andy store will show up tho. Pls help!! This shouldn’t be a wifi problem otherwise it would take so long to open

replies.body:
Turn on "low-spec mode" in the client options and that should make things a bit smoother. Other than that, it might be some background programs slowing down your pc, but let me know how that option helps!

The grey play button is caused by a weak or spotty connection. An ethernet cable might work, but I'd be sure to [**try adjusting your firewall settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) to see if that helps!
I'm having sort of same issues with the client. It's quite slow. Sometimes I can't change my runes in the champions selection, because it's taking to long with loading.
